languages.text: Пышный желто-зеленый мох покрывает стены трущоб, с особой радостью окутывая влажные теплые трубы. Судя по следам, его регулярно срезают, но мох нарастает снова.

Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums, seeming to especially favour the warm, moist pipes. Judging by the marks, the people here regularly shear off the moss, only for it to grow back again.
languages.original_text: Пышный желто-зеленый мох покрывает стены трущоб, с особой радостью окутывая влажные теплые трубы. Судя по следам, его регулярно срезают, но мох нарастает снова.

traits.locale_text: Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums. It especially favours enveloping the moist warm pipes. Judging by the marks, the moss is regularly shorn off, only to grow back again.
Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums. It especially favours enveloping the moist warm pipes. Judging by the marks, the moss is regularly shorn off, only to grow back again.

Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums, seeming to especially favour the warm, moist pipes. Judging by the marks, the people here regularly shear off the moss, only for it to grow back again.

Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums, seeming to especially favour the warm, moist pipes. Judging by the marks, the people here regularly shear off the moss, only for it to grow back again.

languages.text: Un exuberante moho verde amarillento cubre los muros de los suburbios, demostrando una preferencia particular por las tuberías cálidas y húmedas. A juzgar por las marcas, los habitantes podan el moho con frecuencia, pero sigue creciendo.
languages.original_text: Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums, seeming to especially favour the warm, moist pipes. Judging by the marks, the people here regularly shear off the moss, only for it to grow back again.

traits.locale_text: Un exuberante moho verde amarillento cubre los muros de los suburbios, demostrando una preferencia particular por las tuberías cálidas y húmedas. A juzgar por las marcas, los habitantes podan el moho con frecuencia, pero sigue creciendo.

languages.text: 生い茂る黄緑色の苔がスラムの壁を覆っている。特にあたたかく湿ったパイプを好んでいるようだ。そのあとから察するに、ここの人々は定期的に苔を刈り取って入るが、結局また生えてきているらしい。
languages.original_text: Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums, seeming to especially favour the warm, moist pipes. Judging by the marks, the people here regularly shear off the moss, only for it to grow back again.

traits.locale_text: 生い茂る黄緑色の苔がスラムの壁を覆っている。特にあたたかく湿ったパイプを好んでいるようだ。そのあとから察するに、ここの人々は定期的に苔を刈り取って入るが、結局また生えてきているらしい。

languages.text: 贫民窟的墙上长满了郁郁葱葱的黄绿色苔藓，这些苔藓似乎特别喜欢温暖、潮湿的管道。从墙上的痕迹来看，这里的人经常会把苔藓剪掉，但苔藓还是会一次又一次重新长出来。
languages.original_text: Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums, seeming to especially favour the warm, moist pipes. Judging by the marks, the people here regularly shear off the moss, only for it to grow back again.

traits.locale_text: 贫民窟的墙上长满了郁郁葱葱的黄绿色苔藓，这些苔藓似乎特别喜欢温暖、潮湿的管道。从墙上的痕迹来看，这里的人经常会把苔藓剪掉，但苔藓还是会一次又一次重新长出来。

languages.text: Gelbgrünes Moos überwuchert die Mauern der Slums und bevorzugt anscheinend besonders die warmen, feuchten Rohre. Den Spuren nach zu urteilen, kratzen die Leute hier das Moss regelmäßig ab, aber es wächst immer wieder nach.
languages.original_text: Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums, seeming to especially favour the warm, moist pipes. Judging by the marks, the people here regularly shear off the moss, only for it to grow back again.

traits.locale_text: Gelbgrünes Moos überwuchert die Mauern der Slums und bevorzugt anscheinend besonders die warmen, feuchten Rohre. Den Spuren nach zu urteilen, kratzen die Leute hier das Moss regelmäßig ab, aber es wächst immer wieder nach.

languages.text: Les bas quartiers sont recouverts d'une mousse jaune-vert luxuriante, notamment au niveau des tuyaux chauds et humides. À en juger par les marques aux murs, les habitants arrachent régulièrement le lichen, mais en vain.
languages.original_text: Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums, seeming to especially favour the warm, moist pipes. Judging by the marks, the people here regularly shear off the moss, only for it to grow back again.

traits.locale_text: Les bas quartiers sont recouverts d'une mousse jaune-vert luxuriante, notamment au niveau des tuyaux chauds et humides. À en juger par les marques aux murs, les habitants arrachent régulièrement le lichen, mais en vain.

languages.text: Sarımsı yeşil renkteki yoğun bir yosun tabakası, kenar mahallenin duvarlarını kaplıyor. Özellikle ılık ve nemli boruları tercih ediyor gibi görünüyor. İzlere bakılacak olursa buradaki insanların belirli aralıklarla koparmalarına rağmen yosunlar büyümeyi sürdürmüş.
languages.original_text: Lush yellow-green moss covers the walls of the slums, seeming to especially favour the warm, moist pipes. Judging by the marks, the people here regularly shear off the moss, only for it to grow back again.
